title: How to Make a Ginger Lime Mocktail

steps.headline: Measure and add the ingredients to a large jar or pitcher, enough to hold a quart (950 ml).
Stir the ingredients together carefully with a wooden spoon.
Add enough ice to 2 cocktail glasses to fill them halfway.
Pour the mixture over the ice.
Cut a lime into wedges and garnish the drinks.

text: Measure and add the ingredients to a large jar or pitcher, enough to hold a quart (950 ml).  Stir the ingredients together carefully with a wooden spoon.  Add enough ice to 2 cocktail glasses to fill them halfway.  Pour the mixture over the ice.  Cut a lime into wedges and garnish the drinks.  Finished.
